Title: Dhoom 3
Writer: Vijay Krishna Acharya (story), Aditya Chopra (story), Vijay Krishna Acharya (screenplay and dialogue)
Actors: Aamir Khan, Abhishek Bachchan, Katrina Kaif, Uday Chopra
Plot: When Sahir, a circus entertainer trained in magic and acrobatics, turns into a thief to take down a corrupt bank in Chicago that ruined his father, Indian officers Jai and Ali are called to catch him.
